TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Sorry, the chef was calculating the volume of the soup bowl.

Waiter, there's a supercomputer in my soup.

QUICK RUNN IT GONNA TAKE OVER THE WOLRD!

Waiter! My friend is in the soup!!

too bad your friend is the forever alone guy.

WAITERRRRRRRRRR!!!!! EVERYONE IS DIEING IN MY SOUP!! WHEYYYYYYYY!!!

Sorry about that, it seems you were given the wrong soup. I do believe that the poisoned batch was for the politicians in the next booth.

Ahem, waiter? waiter! Waiter! WAITER! WAITER! It does appear that Carl Sagan's face is in my soup.

No, that would be Bill Nye's face. Carl Sagan's face is in the minestrone.

Ahem, waiter? WAITER!!! Some moron put soup in my soup! What's up with that?

Sorry for the Idiocy, sir- It is soup you know.

WAITER! THERE'S Lead Paint IN MY SOUP!

eat it. it makes you more foxy

waiter, jeb and danny2462 are in my soup!

Arrest them.

Waiter, you're in my soup!

I'll be done in a moment, be patient.

Waiter, there is water in my soup!

That's dihydrogen monoxide, not water! Don't drink it!

Waiter, there's blood in my soup.

It's a Freddy Fazbear's special. Now, let me put this on you and... Oh, great. You got brain all over the suit.

Waiter? Waiter... Waiter! WAITER! WAITER!!! Ã¢â‚¬â€¹There's a brony in my soup!

Waiter, there's a soup in my... (Oh darn it how'd I screw up that bad?)

Soup, my waiter's part o... (Oh forget it.)

Fix up yourself first.

Waiter, Jeb drank my soup. And replaced it with Trashcan propellant.

ADD MOAR BOOSTAHS!!!!!!!!

waiter, get out of my soup...

No! It's comfy in here!

Waiter, there's a spoiler in my soup!

Better not look at it! You might get spoiled.

Soup, there's a waiter in my fly!

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Um. Okay? Have... fun? I'll just be on my way...

Waiter, there's a Korolev's Cross in my soup!

T-Minus 5... 4... 3...

Waiter, there's a V-2 in my soup!

Sorry, we were out of Fat Men and Little Boys.

Waiter, there's a spoon in my soup!

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Actually, sir, they had me bring this to you.

Waiter, there's a fork in my soup!

Oh my, must've got mixed up.

Waiter, there's a satellite in my soup! And it's transmitting data!

That's alright, you wanted a LEO soup...

Waiter, there's some serious case of Kessler syndrome in my soup...

Those are bits of meat, and vegetable.

Waiter, there's life in my soup!
